About us

There is a lot of competition in the building materials market today, and the harsh law of the market economy chooses the strongest in the competition. Our company stands these tests with honor and can be proud of its success.

For 8.5 years, our store has been offering for sale various building materials from many manufacturers, but invariably, only of excellent quality. We have long and fruitfully cooperated on the basis of direct deliveries with well-known manufacturers of building materials. We are constantly expanding the scope of our interests.

The product range of our company is very extensive and includes the whole range of finishing materials. Our specialists constantly monitor new developments in the field of construction and repair, in order to provide new products in the form of materials or services as soon as possible. We always have any building materials in stock, and we are ready to deliver any product according to your wishes in the shortest possible time. Our regular customers enjoy various preferences and are able to receive goods by telephone order. If necessary, it is possible to order individual commodity items in excess of the range of the price list.

We employ professionals of various construction specialties, so our customers always receive reliable and complete information about the availability of the necessary materials and competent advice.

The high professionalism of our employees and responsible approach to business allow us to favorably distinguish us from competitors and gain a reputation as a reliable partner and supplier.
